vistra.framework.graph.item

Interface ILayoutVertex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IItem, ILayoutItem, IVertex
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LayoutVertex, VertexStateHandler

    public interface ILayoutVertex
extends IVertex, ILayoutItem
    A layout vertex interface.
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    Layout

      • getValue

        java.lang.String getValue()
        Returns the value. If the vertex is initialized, the sign for infinity will be returned ( SigmaPalette.infinity). If the vertex is whether initialized nor holding a value, an empty string will be returned.
        Returns:
        the value
